name: misc
description: ```mermaid sequenceDiagram     participant browser     participant server     browser->>server: GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/     activate server     server-->>browser: HTML document     deactivate server     browser->>server: GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/kuva.png     activate server     server-->>browser: the png pic     deactivate server     Note right of browser: Page with a pic will is rendered ```
